content:
Hi all, I need to create a profile for heart murmur and I want to capture the category of the murmur namely holosystolic, early, late and mid systolic intensity, quality etc.

1. Is it correct if I consider the category of murmur holosystolic, early, late and mid as components for an Observation?

2. The intensity is divided into grades starting from grade 1 to grade 6, quality has musical, non musical, blowing and harsh which needs to be attached or linked to the above mentioned components. So, shall I slice the coding element of the above mentioned components (holosystolic, early etc)to indicate the intensity and quality, then create an extension to store the sub divisions (grade 1 to 6, musical, non musical etc)respectively.

Thank you
@Eric Haas @Rob Hausam ?
